sentences: Josh Ritter (born October 21, 1976) is an American singer, songwriter, musician, and author who performs and records with the Royal City Band.
In 2006, he was named one of the "100 Greatest Living Songwriters" by Paste magazine.
Ritter was born on October 21, 1976 in Moscow, Idaho to Robert and Sue Ritter.

sentences: After graduating from Moscow High School in 1995, Ritter attended Oberlin College in Oberlin, Ohio.
